summary: Passionate and results-driven Full Stack Developer with 8+ years of experience building scalable web applications and leading development teams. Expertise in React, Node.js, and cloud technologies. Proven track record of delivering high-quality software solutions that drive business growth and enhance user experience. Strong advocate for clean code, test-driven development, and agile methodologies.

experience.description: Lead a team of 5 developers in building enterprise-level SaaS applications. Architected and implemented microservices infrastructure using Node.js and Docker, resulting in 40% improved system performance. Spearheaded the migration from monolithic architecture to microservices, reducing deployment time by 60%.

Developed and maintained multiple client-facing web applications using React and Node.js. Implemented CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and GitHub Actions. Collaborated with UX designers to create responsive and accessible user interfaces. Reduced page load times by 50% through code optimization and lazy loading.

Built responsive websites and web applications for various clients. Worked with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and PHP. Participated in agile development processes and daily stand-ups. Contributed to open-source projects and maintained technical documentation.

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science
education.description: Specialized in Software Engineering and Distributed Systems. GPA: 3.8/4.0
education.extraInfo: Thesis: Optimizing Database Query Performance in Distributed Systems

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Information Technology
education.description: Dean's List all semesters. President of Computer Science Club.
